svcsubproc.title: Bus Interior Light Bars
svcsubproc.para: The bus interior light bars run the entire length of the bus body on each side. The light bars encapsulate the bus harnesses, interior lights and speakers (if applicable). The light bar sections have cover plates at the end of each section. To remove the light bars:

step1.para: Locate the joint covers between the section to be removed. Loosen and remove the mounting screws, then remove the joint covers.
Locate the mounting screws along the section of light bar to be serviced. Loosen and remove the mounting screws, then remove the light bar.

figure.caption: Figure 159. Light Bar and Joint Connector Plates

calloutgroup.callout1: LIGHT BAR JUNCTION COVER MOUNTING SCREW

step1.para: If a light or speaker assembly is located in the section of light bar removed, loosen the mounting screws attaching the light or speaker to the light bar.
Disconnect the harness connector for the speaker or light as may be required.

note.para: The removal of the front and rear covers of the light bar allow access to the harness connectors at the interior of the bus end caps.
